mapper.select: select f.movie_name, c.movie_review_content, substr(movie_review_content, 0, 8) as movie_review_shortcontent, c.movie_review_img, d.member_idx, c.movie_review_writedate from (select * from (select rownum as rnum,a.* from (select * from movie_review order by movie_review_idx desc)a)b where rnum>=#{start} and rnum<=#{end}) c, member d, movie f where d.member_idx=c.member_idx and f.movie_idx=c.movie_idx and d.member_idx=#{member_idx}
select count(*) from movie_review c, member d, movie f where d.member_idx=c.member_idx and f.movie_idx=c.movie_idx and d.member_idx=#{member_idx}

select * from (select rownum as rnum, a.* from (select mr.movie_review_idx, (select member_id from member mm where mm.member_idx=mr.member_idx) as member_id, (select movie_name from movie mv where mv.movie_idx=mr.movie_idx) as movie_name, mr.movie_review_content,mr.movie_review_writedate, (select member_block from member mm where mm.member_idx=mr.member_idx) as member_block from movie_review mr order by movie_review_idx desc) a) where rnum >= #{start} and rnum <= #{end}
select (select member_id from member mm where mm.member_idx=mr.member_idx) as member_id, mr.* from movie_review mr where mr.movie_review_idx=#{idx}
mapper.update: update member set member_block=#{value} where member_idx= (select mr.member_idx from movie_review mr where mr.movie_review_idx=#{idx})
mapper.select: select count(*) from movie_review mr where (select mv.movie_name from movie mv where mv.movie_idx=mr.movie_idx) like '%'||#{search}||'%'

select * from (select rownum as rnum, a.* from (select mr.movie_review_idx, (select member_id from member mm where mm.member_idx=mr.member_idx) as member_id, (select movie_name from movie mv where mv.movie_idx=mr.movie_idx) as movie_name, mr.movie_review_content,mr.movie_review_writedate, (select member_block from member mm where mm.member_idx=mr.member_idx) as member_block from movie_review mr where (select movie_name from movie mv where mv.movie_idx=mr.movie_idx) like '%'||#{search}||'%' order by movie_review_idx desc) a) where rnum >= #{start} and rnum <= #{end}
select member_idx from member where member_id = #{member_id}
